text: Where the FUCK has this genius of a composer gone!???
author: lorkshun

text: Grandia 2 and 3 may have been in 3D, with better graphics, better characters, better music. But you shouldnt forget the main one that started it all. Grandia 1 will always win, because it was the first of them, as simple as that.

author: Alon Jacovi

text:
I really love all Iwadare's compositions. From the first Grandia ( one of the best RPG ever ) to the recent Ace Attorney ( 3, Investigations 1, 2, and 5 ).
I just played grandia 1 and 2, even if the 2nd isn't as good as the first, it's still an excellent game. Everyone told me not to play the others...
author: 7Sep7

text: This game really did have a great sense of being on adventure. I didn't really like it at first but the more I played it, the more it grew on me. I have to say I miss it as well.
author: BxN4

text: Xtreme sucked, but III was great but was missed because of timing and the sour taste of xtreme.
author: Matt 6418

text: I miss this﻿ series, the first two games are some of my favorite RPGs. An awesome battle system and a nice general feeling. They have a great sense of being on adventure. Iwadare's music plays a major role as well, he has such a unique style that makes the games he works on that much better (Grandia series, Lunar series and Radiata Stories immediately come to mind).
